title: Travel Journal
description: A Node.js application that allows the user to create and save travel reviews (stored in SQL database), and, search reviews using Elasticsearch.

title: MVC - Hamburger
description: This project delivers a Node.js application with a Model-View-Control structure.  The app logs and updates a list of user-entered hamburgers using handlebars template engine.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A React application that calls data from OpenWeather API to display a wather dashboard for a user-inputed city.

title: Garden State
description: A React application with MongoDB database that allows users to create, save, and edit custom gardens.

title: Brewfinder
description: Brewfinder is a simple application that returns a list of local breweries based on a user's zipcode.

title: Budget Tracker
description: This project delivers a progressive web application that allows a user to enter simple budget transactions (both offline and online) and charts those transactions.
